dialogue.text: Oh, the Small Screen Fix! I came up with this one.
If you turn this on, I'll do some things and move some UI elements that would be hidden by the Windows taskbar on smaller screens,
usually to the top of the window in menus, or just above the time bar in songs.
Although... There are a few things I won't move...
I won't move the Psych Engine version text in the main menu, nor will I move the health bar.
You'll have to enable Downscroll in the\nGameplay settings to move the health bar. So sorry!
Anyway, I hope you'll find this option useful if you're playing on a smaller screen! Let me know if you have any other questions.
